initial_classification.description: initial classification of radiation plan into anatomical sites
initial_classification.system_prompt: You are a helpful medical assistant with expertise in radiation oncology.
initial_classification.user_prompt: Classify the following radiation plan descriptions into one of these anatomical sites: {classes}. The radiation plan is {RADIATION_PLAN}. Provide only a single site and nothing else.

refinement.system_prompt: You are a helpful medical assistant with expertise in radiation oncology.
refinement.user_prompt: Your task is to refine the initial classification of the radiation plan made by a junior doctor into one of these anatomical sites: {classes}. The radiation plan is {RADIATION_PLAN}. The initial classification is {INITIAL_CLASSIFICATION_RESULT}. Provide only a single category name and nothing else.
